report.title: MNHNL Bats Sites Download Report
report.description: Lists all sites. Normally invoked from Reports tab on the form.

param.name: website_id
param.description: Select the website to return data for:
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM websites

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for:
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys

param.name: orig_location_type_id
param.description: Term ID for the Location Type used to indicate orginal locations:

param.name: new_location_type_id
param.description: Term ID for the Location Type used to indicate new locations:

tabColumn.name: points
tabColumn.func: (CASE WHEN #this#.boundary_geom is null THEN (replace(#this#.centroid_sref, ',' , '')) WHEN GeometryType(#this#.boundary_geom) = 'POINT' THEN replace(replace(replace(ST_AsText(ST_Transform(#this#.boundary_geom,2169)),')',''),'(',''),'POINT','') WHEN GeometryType(#this#.boundary_geom) = 'MULTIPOINT' THEN replace(replace(replace(ST_AsText(ST_Transform(#this#.boundary_geom,2169)),')',''),'(',''),'MULTIPOINT','') WHEN GeometryType(#this#.boundary_geom) = 'GEOMETRYCOLLECTION' AND NOT ST_IsEmpty(ST_CollectionExtract(#this#.boundary_geom, 1)) THEN replace(replace(replace(ST_AsText(ST_Transform(ST_CollectionExtract(#this#.boundary_geom,1),2169)),')',''),'(',''),'MULTIPOINT','') ELSE '' END)
